statements: UPDATE tax_compliance_regulations SET regulation_name = 'GDPR Regulations', update_date = '2022-09-15' WHERE regulation_id = 1;

UPDATE tax_regulations SET regulation_text = 'New tax regulations for US' WHERE country_code = 'US';
UPDATE tax_updates SET update_text = 'Updated tax rates for 2022' WHERE update_date > '2022-01-01';
